title: Irrigation runoff reaches MaMeeFarm canal
summary: Water runoff from a corn field flows into the canal near MaMeeFarm. The farm canal was already low/dry, and this inflow adds water back into the canal.

observations.detail: Water from a nearby corn field flows into the canal connected to/near the farm.
The farm canal was already dry/low; the inflow adds water to the canal.

constraints: Water availability is limited; inflow depends on upstream irrigation/runoff conditions.

integrity.notes: SHA-256 and OpenTimestamps (OTS) will be recorded after commit, following the established workflow.
